links.content:
#  ![Logo alt](images/logo.png)

### License Forms

![](images/license_img.png)

#### Agriculture Department

  * Application for the Grant of Licence to Sell, Stock or Exhibit for Sale or Distribute Insecticides (Form-VI)



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
Every citizen | Fee according to Rule 10 (2) Through Treasury Challan | 

  * Affidavit for Enhance Fee 
  * Situation of the Dealer's premises where the insecticide will be stored/ sold
  * Qualification Proof
  * Principal Certificate of Firm 

| Subject Matter Specialist of Agriculture Development Block | [Fillable PDF](pdfs/Agriculture/Pesticide/03 Application for the grant of license to sell stock or exhibit for sale or distribute insecticide.pdf)  
  
  * Application to Obtain Dealer Licence (Form-A)



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
Every citizen Form in Duplicate  |  Fee of renewable is Rs. 20/- After Licence Expiry within one month the license will be renewed on additional Fees Rs. 25/- Through Treasury Challan | 

  * Photograph of the applicant duly attested by the concerned Officer of The District/ Block
  * Applicant’s PAN No. and Proof of Permanent Residence
  * Affidavit on Stamp Paper attested by the Notary/ 1st Class Magistrate
  * Affidavit for responsible Person under Seed Act duly attested by Notary/ 1st Class Magistrate
  * Principal Certificate/ source Certificate from whom/ where the seed is obtained
  * Side MAP of Store/Godown duly verified by the concern SMS/ ADO/ AEO
  * List of Dealers
  * Copy of Partnership Deed
  * Memorandum of Company
  * Inspection Report of Seed Inspector 

| Subject Matter Specialist of Agriculture Development Block | [ Fillable PDF ](pdfs/Agriculture/SEED/02 Application for renewal of license to carry on the business of a dealer in seeds.pdf)  
  
  * Application for Renewal of Licence to Carry on the Business of a Dealer in Seeds (Form-C)



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
Every citizen Form- A in Duplicate | Rs. 50/- Through Treasury Challan | 

  * Photograph of the applicant duly attested by the concerned Officer of The District/ Block
  * Applicant’s PAN No. and Proof of Permanent Residence
  * Affidavit on Stamp Paper attested by the Notary/ 1st Class Magistrate.
  * Affidavit for responsible Person under Seed Act duly attested by Notary/ 1st Class Magistrate
  * Principal Certificate/ source Certificate from whom/ where the seed is obtained
  * Side MAP of Store/Godown duly verified by the concern SMS/ ADO/ AEO
  * List of Dealers
  * Copy of Partnership Deed
  * Memorandum of Company
  * Inspection Report of Seed Inspector

| Subject Matter Specialist of Agriculture Development Block | [ Fillable PDF ](pdfs/Agriculture/SEED/02 Application for renewal of license to carry on the business of a dealer in seeds.pdf)  
  
  * Application for Renewal of Licence to Sell, Stock or Exhibit for Sale or Distribute Insecticides (Form-VII)



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
Every citizen | Fee according to Rule 10 (2) Through Treasury Challan | 

  * Affidavit for Enhance Fee
  * Situation of the Dealer's premises where the insecticide will be stored/ sold
  * Qualification Proof
  * Principal Certificate of Firm 

| Subject Matter Specialist of Agriculture Development Block | [ Fillable PDF ](pdfs/Agriculture/Pesticide/03 Application for the grant of license to sell stock or exhibit for sale or distribute insecticide.pdf)  
  
  * Fertilizer License for Manufacturing License/Renewal



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
Every Citizen | Rs. 1000/- grade | 

  * Project Report.
  * Affidavit of responsible person / Nodal Officer. 
  * Partnership deed/ MOA Company.
  * Set up of Laboratory/ Vertification Laboratory equipments.
  * SSI registration.
  * NOC of Pollution Board.
  * SSI registration.
  * Sale return for last 3 years to quality report (in case of renewal).

| Director of Agriculture | [ PDF ](pdfs/Agriculture/20-FormD.pdf)  
  
  * Fertilizer License for retail License



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
B.Sc. Agriculture/ B.Sc with Chemistry/ Diploma in agriculture from recognized University Govt., Institute/ Certificate course of fifteen days from any State Agriculture University or Krishi Vigyan Kendras or National Institute of Agricultural Extension Management (MANAGE) OR National Institute of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj (NIDPR) OR Fertilizer Association of India or any other approval Govt. Institute. | Rs. 500/- online e-challan  | 

  * O Form.
  * Map of Godown.
  * NOC from Society/ Panchayat 
  * Sale returen for last 3 years to quality report (in case of renewal).

| SMS (Agr.) at Concerned Block | [ PDF ](pdfs/Agriculture/20-GrantOfFertilizerLicenceRenewal.pdf)  
  
  * Fertilizer License for Wholesale/ Renewal



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
Every Citizen | Rs. 2250/- | 

  * O Form.
  * Map of Godown/ Rent agreement. 
  * Affidavit of responsible person.li>
  * Partnership deed/ MOA Company.
  * Quality Control Reports. 
  * Price tag of fertilizers to be sold.
  * Power of Attorney of authorized Signatory.
  * Sale returen for last 3 years to quality report (in case of renewal).

| Joint Director of Agriculture | [ PDF ](pdfs/Agriculture/20A-Forms.pdf)  
  
  * Grant of Insecticide License



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
Every Citizen | Rs. 2000/- per Insecticide or maximum Twenty thousand through online/e-Challan | 

  * Application in form III/IV for grant/renewal of insecticides manufacturing license.
  * Self-attested copies of Registration certificate issued by CIB&RC for addition of new products. 
  * Affidavit from MD/Director/Partner/Sole Proprietior regarding appointment of person.
  * Affidavit from MD/Director/Partner/Sole Proprietor to the effect that no employee of the firm has been declared as Proclaimed.
  * Affidavit of the person responsible for the purpose of section 33 of the Insecticides Act, 1968.
  * Affidavit of the full-time expert staff
  * Self-attested copy of ‘no objection/consent for water/Air/Hazardous Waste disposal from State Pollution Control Board.
  * Inspection report/recommendation of the Inspection team.
  * Consent of the Medical Board.
  * Valid marketing agreement.
  * Affidavit from MD/Director/Partner/Sole Proprietor of the marketer company/firm regarding appointment of person.
  * Affidavit of the person of the marketer company/firm responsible for the purpose of Section 33 of the Insecticides Act, 1968.
  * Self-attested copy of the Manufacturing/sale licence of the marketer company/firm.

| Joint Director of Agricluture cum-License authority | [ PDF ](pdfs/Agriculture/19-GrantOfInsecticideLicence.pdf)  
  
  * Grant of Seed License



Eligibility Criteria | Fee and Payment | Documents Required | Submit to | Download  
---|---|---|---|---  
Every Citizen | Rs. 500/- online or through e-challan | 

  * Application on Form A.
  * Original Challan after submission of application fee of Rs. 1000/-.
  * NOC from Panchayat/Cooperative Society.
  * Site plan of place of business.
  * Rent agreement; if any.
  * Two passport size photographs. 
  * Inspection Report of Seed Inspector.
  * Principal Certificate.
  * Application on Form C.

| [ PDF ](pdfs/Agriculture/21-GrantofSeedLicense.pdf)
